intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Urban Atlas Building Block Height Model (UA BBHM) 2012, a key component of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It provides a comprehensive guide to the BBHM product, designed to deliver harmonised building height data for 870 cities and urban centres across the EEA38 region. The manual details the product's scope, methodology, technical specifications, quality assessments, and potential applications in urban analysis, policy support, and understanding urban density using very high-resolution (VHR) imagery.
